name: Therme Mindful blossom foaming shower
composition: INGREDIENTS: AQUA, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, GLYCERIN, ISOPENTANE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, PARFUM, ACRYLATES/STEARETH-20 METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER, ISOBUTANE, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, TETRASODIUM EDTA, SOY ACID, LAURETH-4, COCAMIDE MIPA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LINALOOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, POLYQUATERNIUM-39, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, CAPRYLIC ACID, CAPRIC ACID, LIMONENE, SODIUM BENZOATE, TOCOPHEROL.
